articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Heads of State of Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Messages to Heads of State of Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent messages to heads of state of different countries in reply to their messages of greeting on the occasion of the 74th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included the presidents of Myanmar, Syria, Nigeria and Uganda.
					
					 He also sent reply messages to the co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and the director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea.
					
					 In the reply messages Kim Jong Un expressed deep thanks to them for their sincere congratulations on the occasion of Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary.
					
					 Expressing belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and the relevant countries would grow stronger, he wished them bigger victories and successes in their work for their countries' sovereignty, security and social development.

articles.title: Congratulations to Secretary-General of Arab League
articles.content:
Congratulations to Secretary-General of Arab League
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, foreign minister of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Ahmed Abul-Gheit on his election as secretary-general of the League of Arab States.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional and good relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and the League of Arab States and its member nations would grow stronger, the message wished the secretary-general success in his work for the unity and cohesion of the league.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to FM of Turkey
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to FM of Turkey
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Tuesday sent a message of sympathy to his Turkish counterpart Mevlut Cavusoglu in connection with bomb terrorism in Ankara that caused many casualties.
					 Expressing deep condolences to the victims, bereaved families and the Turkish government, the message reiterated the DPRK government's consistent stand of opposing all forms of terrorism.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Myanmar Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Myanmar Appointed
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Jong Ho Bom was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Myanmar, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: American Student Sentenced to 15 Years of Hard Labor in DPRK
articles.content:
American Student Sentenced to 15 Years of Hard Labor in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Court of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on Wednesday held a trial on Otto Frederick Warmbier, a student at the University of Virginia, the United States who was arrested on the charge of anti-DPRK hostile acts.
					 Attending the trial as observers were citizens from different walks of life.
					
					 The trial examined the case of Otto Frederick Warmbier, accused of violation of Article 60 of the DPRK Criminal Code (State Subversion Charge). A written indictment confirming his crimes was submitted and there were inquiries into the facts of the case.
					
					 In the course of the inquiry, the accused confessed to the serious offense against the DPRK he had committed, pursuant to the U.S. government's hostile policy toward it, in a bid to impair the unity of its people after entering it as a tourist.
					
					 The court sentenced him to fifteen years of hard labor.

articles.title: DPRK Government, Political Parties and Organizations Issue Special Statement
articles.content:
DPRK Government, Political Parties and Organizations Issue Special Statement
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government, political parties and organizations Wednesday issued a special statement denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of traitors for pushing the situation to the point of explosion through hideous provocations.
					 The statement said:
					
					 While frantically staging the largest-ever joint military drills Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 against the DPRK throughout south Korea, the enemies are pushing ahead with "scenario for attack drill part 2" the keynote of which is the "operation for advance into the northern inland area" targeting the strategic key area of the DPRK.
					
					 They are openly blustering that there is no other way but special operation such as "beheading operation" to neutralize the north's nuclear capability and seize nuclear control, touting the "operation for advance into the northern inland area" focusing on the "precision strike at the supreme leadership of the north and its nuclear, missile and other core facilities in contingency" by escalating the above-said joint military drills.
					
					 This is the unprecedented and hideous provocation to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and an open declaration of a war against it.
					
					 The DPRK government, political parties and organizations clarify the following stand in view of the prevailing grave situation:
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressors and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors should not forget even a moment the fact that the Korean People's Army's battle for mounting a deadly preemptive attack on them to blow up their stronghold of strike at the headquarters of the Korean revolution before anything else by fully charging miniaturized, precision and diversified nuclear warheads is by no means an empty talk.
					
					 Once there is a slight sign of the start of their foolish special operation, the Korean People's Army will promptly launch the battle for preemptive attack without hesitation and our people will courageously turn out in an all-people action to annihilate them to the last man in the sky, land and seas, keeping pace with the start of the operation by the infuriated revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 There would be no difference between the front and the rear for us to fight a battle for devotedly protecting the leader. All the people, irrespective of sex and age, will turn out as one and launch an all-people, nationwide sacred war and escalate it worldwide till they wipe out to the last one all the provocateurs involved in the reckless special operation such as "beheading operation".
					
					 The world will clearly see what a miserable end the aggressors and provocateurs will meet while going reckless to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and "bring down its social system" in the eyes of the service personnel and people all out in the battle to devotedly protect their leader.

articles.title: National Reunification Institute Issues White Paper Cursing Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
National Reunification Institute Issues White Paper Cursing Park Geun Hye
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute Wednesday released a white paper reflecting the hatred of the south Korean people and the international community's  denunciation of Park Geun Hye, bloodthirsty dictator, arch criminal who threw the people's living into destitution and heinous confrontation maniac putting even the successive puppet rulers into the shade.
					 Recalling that Park grabbed power through plots and conspiracy, the white paper said that she set it as the goal of her whole career to "restore the honor" of Park Chung-Hee, her father, and worked with bloodshot eyes to revive the "yusin" dictatorship. It noted that the whole of south Korea is now shaking with the people's hatred for her and overseas Koreans are staging demonstrations against her. It went on:
					
					 The south Korean people from all walks of life and overseas Koreans are cursing Park Geun Hye as she put economy into bankruptcy and people's living into destitution.
					
					 The anger and resentment of all the Koreans at Park have reached an extreme phase as she has pushed the north-south relations to the worst catastrophe and is working hard to bring a nuclear disaster to the nation, hell-bent on escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 They are terming Park a mad woman infected with all foul diseases.
					
					 Park Geun Hye, daughter of the notorious "yusin" dictator, also draws criticism from the world people. 
					
					 There is no such a despicable human being in the world as Park Geun Hye who is cursed and criticized at home and abroad. 
					
					 Only hell awaits her as she is more dead than alive, being forsaken by the people, the white paper said.

articles.title: New Briquette Bonding Agent Developed
articles.content:
New Briquette Bonding Agent Developed
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Taehung Youth Hero Mine in the DPRK established a process of producing new briquette bonding agent based on locally available raw materials, which would be conducive to enhancing the independence of the fireproof materials industry.
					 The process is equipped with a device for collecting waste gas generated by the production of the agent.
					
					 The Taehung Youth Hero Mine is a world-leading magnesite mine which was developed in the late 1980s. Its main products include ore, magnesia clinker, high-quality magnesia clinker and light burned magnesia.
					
					 With the ongoing 70-day campaign as an occasion, it is now carrying out its daily production quota at 130 percent on an average.

articles.title: Visual Agitation Inspires Working People in DPRK
articles.content:
Visual Agitation Inspires Working People in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A brisk visual agitation goes on in different parts of the DPRK to inspire the working citizens in the 70-day campaign for significantly greeting the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Creators in the fine arts sector are active at industrial establishments across the country to give encouragement to the workers in production and construction through visual agitation. They include those from the Mansudae Art Studio, Korean Central Fine Arts Studio and Art Studio of the Ministry of Railways and teachers and students of Pyongyang University of Fine Arts.
					
					 They have displayed inspiring visual aids such as news-boards and posters to encourage the workers to performing fresh feats in production and construction.
					
					 The visual agitation is one of the WPK's traditional agitation forms aimed to arouse the popular masses to carrying out their revolutionary tasks.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Performing Heroic Feats in 70-Day Campaign True to Self-Development-First Principle
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Performing Heroic Feats in 70-Day Campaign True to Self-Development-First Principle
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial calls for creating the new Chollima and Mallima speed and performing heroic feats in the 70-day campaign on the self-development-first principle.
					 The self-development-first principle represents a revolutionary spirit of remarkably redoubling our strength and paving our way ourselves.
					
					 It is the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea to help all Koreans work hard with the firm will to do everything, believing in their strength, without the slightest vacillation before difficulties and trial with the 70-day campaign as a momentum, the editorial says, adding: 
					
					 Self-development serves as the most powerful weapon to instill into them strong faith that one's own thing is the best and one's own strength is the most dependable and to completely root out undesirable ideas and spirit such as flunkeyism, national nihilism and proclivity to import.
					
					 Matchless pluck and grit and indomitable stamina and high creative energy to solve everything by relying on one's own strength stem from absolute trust in one's own strength and strong will for national self-respect.
					
					 The party's determination and will to accomplish the great cause of building a thriving nation and realize the people's beautiful dream and ideals by our own efforts and with indigenous technology and resources are now being translated into realities through the dynamic practical drive of all service personnel and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Warmongers Not to Go Reckless
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Warmongers Not to Go Reckless
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- It is quite just that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have taken a full posture for a preemptive attack in the face of the daily increasing nuclear war moves of the hostile forces.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in a commentary Wednesday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Neither the Korean nation nor the world people can escape a nuclear war disaster if the enemies are overlooked in their nuclear war racket for invading the north which increasingly gains severity.
					
					 The DPRK needed a new mode of counteraction under the extreme situation in which the U.S. sought to brandish a nuclear war sword.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have entered into the general offensive to fully counter the nuclear war provocation by the U.S. and its followers, a reflection of the burning hatred of all servicepersons and people of the country and their will to make a thousand-fold retaliation against the enemies.
					
					 Now that the enemies have openly opted for nuclear war provocation defying the sovereignty of the DPRK, its military counteraction can not but be more preemptive and offensive nuclear strike.
					
					 All the operation groups of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are fully ready to preempt merciless and annihilating strike at the enemies if they show even the slightest sign of provocation.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly be aware of the war deterrence built up by the DPRK for decades for a final victory in confrontation with it.
					
					 The aggressors, war maniacs had better be prudent if they do not want to be shelled by various caliber multiple launch rocket system, being targeted by the retaliatory nuclear bomb attack means deployed standby in the operation theatres of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Nuclear Criminal
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Nuclear Criminal
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Cecil Haney, commander of the U.S. Strategic Force, recently said modernization of nuclear weapons admits of no choice like a matter of urgent necessity.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says:
					
					 This proves itself that the U.S. is a despicable nuclear criminal threatening the world with nukes and driving mankind into the crucible of a nuclear war.
					
					 It was none other than the U.S. which abused nuclear technology for manufacturing weapons of mass destruction and brought a nuclear disaster to mankind, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. has used A-bombs as means for domination, supremacy, highhandedness and oppression down through generations, regarding it as a powerful means for implementing its strategy for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. scenario to establish monopoly over nuclear weapons and carry out its nuclear strategy is posing a serious threat to international stability, peace and world development.
					
					 The world is, therefore, exposed to a fresh nuclear arms race and the danger of a nuclear war owing to the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is mulling opening "2016 Nuclear Security Summit" at the end of this month.
					
					 Washington is vociferating about nonproliferation of nukes and nuclear substance though it is the world's worst nuclear criminal and culprit of nuclear proliferation. This is a tragicomedy that makes the boiled head of a cow provoke a side-splitting laughter.
					
					 The empire of evils should be brought to a court of history as it is making desperate efforts to dominate the world with horrible nuclear weapons.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Denounce U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Ssangyong Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Denounce U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Ssangyong Drills
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- An article posted on the south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo on March 14 slammed the U.S. and south Korean warlike forces' adventurous Ssangyong drills aimed at a preemptive attack.
					 The article said:
					
					 The gravity of the drills started on March 12 is that they are most provocative as the climax of the OPLAN 5015.
					
					 The war rehearsal clearly showed who is threatening peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is impossible for the U.S. to "bring down" the DPRK through a war.
					
					 The U.S. should stop the nuclear war drills targeting the north and opt for dialogue for peace in order to escape catastrophe. This is the only way out for the U.S.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime should immediately stop the saber-rattling that holds the nation and people hostage.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Punishing "Saenuri Party" for Cooking up "Anti-Terrorism Law"
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Punishing "Saenuri Party" for Cooking up "Anti-Terrorism Law"
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- 29 human rights, civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society, Confederation of Trade Unions, Bar Association for Democratic Society and the Society for Human Rights Movement issued a statement on Monday calling for judging the lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" who cooked up an evil law against human rights.
					 The statement deplored that the gentries of the "Saenuri Party" railroaded the "anti-terrorism bill" through the "National Assembly," thus making an evil law for justifying the control and watch on the people.
					
					 It warned that the lawmakers from the "Saenuri Party" would be certainly defeated in the coming general election as they cooked up the "anti-terrorism law."
					
					 It demanded the regime and the ruling party to repeal the "anti-terrorism law" at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Stages Action for Peace against War
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Stages Action for Peace against War
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Pusan People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a news conference before the operational command of the puppet Navy on March 13 in protest against the entry of the flotilla of nuclear carrier USS John C Stennis into Pusan Port and Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					 The organization in its press release said the flotilla of the above-said carrier is a typical force for preemptive attack to be involved in "contingency" on the Korean peninsula before any other forces, adding that the joint military drills involving such nuclear war means are tremendous military pressure on the north.
					
					 It slammed the portcall of the flotilla aimed to escalate the danger of war and confrontation on the peninsula and in Northeast Asia and demanded it sail back at once.

articles.title: Meeting of Solidarity with Korean People Held in Russia
articles.content:
Meeting of Solidarity with Korean People Held in Russia
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting of solidarity with the Korean people took place in Nakhodka, Russia on March 7.
					 Its participants were briefed on the statement of the DPRK National Defence Commission and the crucial statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Zelenov, first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territory of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, said:
					
					 The joint military exercises being staged by the U.S., south Korea and other followers are rendering the situation on the Korean peninsula extremely tense as they are unprecedented in their aggressive nature.
					
					 The war rehearsals are unpardonable gangster-like moves to deprive a country of not only its sovereignty but also its right to existence.
					
					 A secretary of the same city committee fully supported the self-defensive and decisive measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the outrageous "sanctions resolution" fabricated by the U.S. and its followers and the aggressive joint military drills on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Observed by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Observed by Koreans in China
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the General Association of Koreans in China for splendidly celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 9.
					 Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the association, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold a meeting, film show, photo and book exhibition and other events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Switzerland
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Switzerland
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Basel on March 9.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events from March 13 to April 17.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Ireland
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Ireland
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- An Irish preparatory committee for celebrating President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 9.
					 Irina Malenko, chairwoman of the Ireland-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange political and cultural events to highly praise and give wide publicity to the exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Congo
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Congo
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A Congolese preparatory committee for celebrating President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Brazzaville on March 10.
					 Vital Balla, chairman of the Congolese Association for Friendship among Peoples, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Il Sung's revolutionary life and exploits and the achievements made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in defending the country and building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and organize colorful political and cultural events such as celebration, lecture and film show to mark the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported by Chairman of Socialist Party of Romania
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported by Chairman of Socialist Party of Romania
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, gave his impressions of the DPRK after visiting it. 
					 He said: I witnessed the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the government of the DPRK paying deep attention to the people's living and the Korean people living full of confidence and optimism.
					
					 The WPK is enforcing people-oriented policies including free health care and free education and the Korean people are leading a happy life as a large harmonious family.
					
					 The socialist policies encourage the people in their struggle.
					
					 This is ascribable to the wise leadership of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 It was entirely thanks to their wise leadership that the DPRK invariably held high the banner of socialism when it was lowered in different countries and the imperialists became undisguised in their moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 We are sure that the heroic Korean people will achieve greater successes in the struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification under the energetic leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman extended firm solidarity to the Korean people advancing, undeterred by the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 He hoped that the WPK and the people would wage a dynamic drive to greet the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with shining labor successes.

articles.title: Koreans in Kazakhstan Accuse U.S. and Its Followers of Their Confrontation Row against DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in Kazakhstan Accuse U.S. and Its Followers of Their Confrontation Row against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kazakhstan issued a statement on March 8 in denunciation of the U.S. and its followers' confrontation row against the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the DPRK's H-bomb test was a self-defensive measure for defending the country's sovereignty and national right to existence from the U.S. aggressive hostile policy toward the former and its daily-increasing nuclear threat to the former.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The DPRK's launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 was an exercise of the internationally recognized legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 However, the U.S., Japan and south Korean puppet group, its followers, are openly revealing their ambition to stifle the DPRK while working hard to knock into shape the triangle military alliance under the pretext of the latter's successful H-bomb test and satellite launch.
					
					 The U.S. pressed the UN Security Council into adopting a "resolution on harsh sanctions" while  Japan made public the so-called "independent sanctions" against the DPRK, resorting to such unethical and inhumane acts as strictly restricting the legitimate activities of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and ruthlessly trampling down the rights of Koreans in Japan to live.
					
					 What is more serious is that the Park Geun Hye group is joining the U.S. and Japan in their mean hostile acts against the DPRK.
					
					 The Park's group bereft of reason is busy staging the largest-ever joint military exercises for stifling the DPRK after introducing even the U.S. nuclear strike means into south Korea.
					
					 The United Confederation of Koreans in Kazakhstan strongly demands the U.S. and south Korean puppet group halt their reckless nuclear war exercises against the DPRK at once.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Denounced in Indonesia
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Denounced in Indonesia
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The Pioneer Party of Indonesia, Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia, Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange and Bungkarno University of Indonesia in a joint statement on March 9 denounced the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers for their joint military drills targeting the DPRK.
					 The statement said that the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 are the largest-ever nuclear war drills involving huge troops and war hardware.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The DPRK clarified its principled stand to resolutely counter the joint military drills with a more preemptive and offensive nuclear strike now that the war drumbeats are regarded as the most undisguised nuclear war provocation against it.
					
					 It is a sovereign state's due right to self-defence that the DPRK has bolstered up its nuclear force to cope with the U.S. ever-escalating nuclear threat and blackmail against it.
					
					 We, who set store by peace and justice, condemn the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises as a grave provocation harassing peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world and strongly urge them to stop the criminal nuclear war drills at once.

articles.title: Russian Political Parties Urge U.S. Not to Interfere in Korean Issue
articles.content:
Russian Political Parties Urge U.S. Not to Interfere in Korean Issue
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Russian political parties issued statements on March 11 denouncing the UN Security Council's "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK and the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 The Liberal Democratic Party of Russia said in a statement titled "Hands off Korea!" that to hype "threat" from the DPRK cannot be viewed otherwise than an attempt to put pressure on the country pursuing independent foreign policy.
					
					 The Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation noted in a statement:
					
					 The U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises have been kicked up every year but the on-going drills are unprecedented in their aggressive nature.
					
					 Therefore, the danger of a catastrophic nuclear war is escalating extremely on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We appeal to the Russian people to show stronger solidarity with the Korean people struggling for defending the country's sovereignty and right to existence and achieving national reunification.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, hands off Korea!

articles.title: Sanctions Do Not Work on Korean People: Chilean Organization
articles.content:
Sanctions Do Not Work on Korean People: Chilean Organization
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- As shown by the reality of the DPRK undergoing steady development, sanctions do not work on the Korean people.
					 The Chilean Branch of the Korean Friendship Association said this in a statement issued on March 5 criticizing the UN Security Council's unreasonable "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The UNSC's "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK is for realizing the U.S. and its stooges' sinister purpose to occupy the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. persists in slandering the DPRK.
					
					 It is also working hard to invade the DPRK again.
					
					 We strongly denounce the UNSC's "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK.
					
					 Those who masterminded the "resolution" are, indeed, the betes noires of history.
					
					 The above-said resolution contradicts the UN Charter.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever register successes and strike the imperialists with horror.

articles.title: Regional Body Slams UNSC's "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK
articles.content:
Regional Body Slams UNSC's "Sanctions Resolution" against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Adherents to the Juche idea in the African region bitterly denounce the UN Security Councils' "sanctions resolution" and war drills against the DPRK.
					 The African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a statement issued on March 8 in protest against the "resolution."
					
					 The U.S. again prodded the UNSC into cooking up the hostile "resolution" touching off resentment of the progressives, instead of concluding a peace treaty with the DPRK, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 It is entirely just for the Korean people to resolutely reject the "resolution" and firmly defend their homeland.
					
					 No one is allowed to take issue with the DPRK's right to self-defense and space development for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The statement called on world progressives loving independence and peace to denounce the unprecedented criminal acts of the U.S. imperialists and their followers against the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days to Be Marked in Guinea
Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A Guinean preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Conakry on March 8.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the undying feats of the great persons of Mt. Paektu and organize colorful events to extend support and solidarity to the Korean people who are stepping up the building of a thriving socialist nation while foiling the obstructive moves of all hostile forces under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasions of the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and 5th anniversary of Kim Jong Un's election as the first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a lideres de Estado de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensajes de respuesta a lideres de Estado de varios paises
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio mensajes de respuesta a los jefes de Estado quienes le hicieron llegar misivas felicitando el 74o aniversario del natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il (16 de febrero).
					Entre los destinatarios figuran Thein Sein, Presidente de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar, Bashar al-Assad, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria, Muhammadu Buhari, Presidente de la Republica Federal de Nigeria, y Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, Presidente de la Republica de Uganda.
					
					Tambien, lo hizo al copresidente del Consejo de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il y el director general del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche.
					
					En las misivas, el Mariscal les expreso profundo agradecimiento por haber enviado sinceras felicitaciones con motivo de esa efemeride y manifesto conviccion de que se ampliaran y se fortaleceran ininterrumpidamente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los respectivos paises.
					
					Y les deseo mayores victorias y exitos en sus labores para la soberania, seguridad y desarrollo social del pais.

articles.title: Canciller coreano expresa condolencias a su homologo turco
articles.content:
Canciller coreano expresa condolencias a su homologo turco
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- El canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Su Yong, envio el dia 15 un mensaje de condolencias a su homologo turco, Mevlut Cavusoglu, en relacion con que se produjeron muchas perdidas humanas por el terror de bomba en Ankara, capital de Turquia.
					El remitente expresa profundas condolencias a las victimas, sus familiares y el gobierno turco y reafirma la invariable posicion del gobierno de la RPDC de oponerse a todo tipo del terrorismo.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano a acreditarse en Myanmar
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano a acreditarse en Myanmar
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Segun un decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jong Ho Bom, fue nombrado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en la Republica de la Union de Myanmar.

articles.title: Condenada a ciudadano norteamericano pena de trabajo reeducativo de 15 anos
articles.content:
Condenada a ciudadano norteamericano pena de trabajo reeducativo de 15 anos
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el Tribunal Supremo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el juicio al ciudadano norteamericano Otto Frederick Warmbier, detenido por sus actos hostiles anti-RPDC.
					Estuvieron presentes alli las masas de diversos estratos.
					
					 Se presento el acta de acusacion que confirma el hecho de crimen despues de examinar el registro del incidente de Otto Frederick Warmbier, acusado correspondiente al articulo 60 del codigo penal de la RPDC (crimen de complot de derrocamiento de Estado), y hubo la investigacion del hecho.
					
					En el proceso de investigacion, el acusado reconocio sus delitos de que al entrar como turista en la RPDC cometio un grave acto hostil con el proposito de descomponer la base de la unidad monolitica del pueblo coreano sumandose a la politica hostil anti-RPDC del gobierno norteamericano.
					
					A continuacion, se presentaron las palabras de los testigos y las materias de prueba que confirman el crimen del acusado.
					
					En la argumentacion, el fiscal propuso al presente juicio condenar la pena de trabajo reeducativo ilimitado al acusado, diciendo que el crimen de Otto Frederick Warmbier corresponde al acto hostil contra la RPDC y su regimen socialista, razon por la cual debe ser sometido merecidamente al castigo severo segun la ley de la RPDC.
					
					En su alegato, el abogado propuso al presente juicio condenarle no la pena de trabajo reeducativo ilimitado propuesta por la parte de fiscal sino la otra limitada, para que el acusado experimentara por si mismo cuan estupido fue su proceder presenciando en el futuro el inagotable poderio de la RPDC que se manifiesta vigorosamente a todo el mundo, y el aspecto verdadero de la nacion del Sol que goza de todas las felicidades socialistas, aunque son muy graves sus crimenes.
					
					En el juicio se condeno al acusado la pena de trabajo reeducativo de 15 anos.

articles.title: Publicada declaracion especial de gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de RPDC
articles.content:
Publicada declaracion especial de gobierno, partidos politicos y entidades de RPDC
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- El gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hicieron publica el dia 16 una declaracion especial en relacion con que los imperialistas norteamericanos y los traidores surcoreanos llevan la situacion a la peor fase de explosion recurriendo a las graves acciones provocativas  contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Los enemigos despliegan en toda la extension surcoreana los fanaticos simulacros militares conjuntos de mayor envergadura Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16 contra la RPDC. Y en este marco, libran atrevidamente los "ejercicios de ataque", segunda parte del presente alboroto belico, cuyo nucleo es la "operacion de avance al interior" de las importantes zonas estrategicas de la RPDC. 
					
					Al anunciar que los "ejercicios de asalto al interior" enfocan en "atacar con precision las instalaciones medulares del Norte incluso la Direccion Suprema, los establecimientos nucleares y los misiles en el tiempo de emergencia", los enemigos insisten abiertamente en que para frenar la posesion de armas nucleares y tomar el derecho de control nuclear de la RPDC no hay otro remedio mas que librar las operaciones especiales como "operacion de decapitacion". 
					
					La declaracion especial lo califica de mas grave provocacion sin precedente a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y de abierta declaracion de guerra contra esta. 
					
					Con respecto a la grave situacion actual, el gobierno, los partidos politicos y las entidades de la RPDC aclaran la siguiente posicion:
					
					Los agresores imperialistas yanquis y la banda de los traidores de Park Geun-hye no deben olvidar ni un momento que nunca es la palabra vana la guerra basada en el demoledor golpe preventivo del ejercito coreano, dotado de la bomba nuclear minimizada, precisa y diversificada, para convertir en cenizas el nido de los enemigos que acechan la Direccion de la Revolucion Coreana.
					
					Si los enemigos se atreven a dar indicios minimos de la operacion especial, nuestro ejercito entrara de inmediato en la batalla de golpe preventivo sin alguna vacilacion y nuestro pueblo se levantara audazmente en la batalla pannacional por aniquilar totalmente a los enemigos en el cielo, la tierra y el mar de la patria en respuesta al inicio de la operacion de las enfurecidas fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					Nuestra batalla de defensa a ultranza al lider se desplegara fuertemente como batalla sagrada de todo el pueblo y todo el estado en escala mundial hasta que se eliminen totalmente los provocadores involucrados en las imprudentes operaciones especiales tales como la "operacion de descabezamiento".  
					
					El mundo presenciara correctamente el tragico fin de los agresores y provocadores que maniobran freneticamente sin prudencia contra la dignidad maxima y por el "derrumbe del regimen", de la RPDC.

articles.title: IRP publica carta blanca
articles.content:
IRP publica carta blanca
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publica el dia 16 una carta blanca que muestra el odio de la poblacion surcoreana y la censura de la sociedad internacional contra Park Geun-hye, dictadora mas feroz, destructora mas cruel de vida del pueblo y malvada de la confrontacion fratricida, quien supera a los anteriores mandatarios surcoreanos.
					El documento revela los crimenes de Park quien despues de ocupar el Poder mediante complots e intrigas se esforzo tesoneramente por rehabilitar la dictadura de "Yusin (renovacion)" tomando por la meta de su vida la "recuperacion de honor" de su padre Park Chung Hee y narra la situacion del Sur de Corea donde reina el odio de los habitantes surcoreanos y las manifestaciones de los coreanos en ultramar contra ella 
					
					Se refiere a los delitos de Park que destruyo la economia y la vida del pueblo.
					
					Subraya que el odio y la ira de toda la nacion coreana contra esa traidora que al ser enloquecida en la confrontacion fratricida, llevo las relaciones intercoreanas a la destruccion sin precedente y maniobra desesperadamente para acarrear el catastrofe nuclear a la nacion.
					
					Asevera que califican a Park de la histerica con todas las enfermedades malignas.
					
					Se refiere a que las opiniones publicas del mundo estan censurando a Park, hija del dictador de "Yusin" de mala fama.
					
					En este mundo no hay ni una persona maligna comparable con Park Geun-hye, que esta siendo objeto de toda clase de odios y censuras del interior y el exterior del pais, senala y puntualiza que a ella, repudiada por la opinion publica, le queda solo el camino hacia el infierno.

articles.title: Belicistas deben actuar con prudencia, advierte Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Belicistas deben actuar con prudencia, advierte Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- Es muy justo que las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hayan entrado en la disposicion completa para dar golpe preventivo frente a las cada dia mas crecientes maniobras de guerra nuclear de las fuerzas hostiles. 
					Senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado en su edicion de este miercoles y continua:
					
					Si estamos con brazos cruzados ante el alboroto belico de los enemigos contra la RPDC, la nacion coreana no puede vivir en paz ni el mundo puede evitar los desastres de la guerra nuclear. 
					
					En la situacion extremada en que EE.UU. nos impone la guerra nuclear con el despotismo militar, nos necesito un nuevo modo de enfrentamiento. 
					
					Reflejando la colera incontenible y la voluntad de venganza de todos los militares y civiles coreanos, las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas entraron en la ofensiva general para frustrar completamente la locura de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. y sus satelites. 
					
					Puesto que se tornan mas abiertas las maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear de los enemigos contra la soberania de la RPDC, esta se ve obligada a tomar las contramedidas militares con el ataque nuclear mas preventivo y mas ofensivo.
					
					Todos los colectivos operacionales de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC estan en la disposicion de ataque preventivo para dar de inmediato el golpe demoledor a los enemigos. 
					
					EE.UU. debe darse clara cuenta del disuasivo de guerra de la RPDC consolidado durante varios decenios para saldar la cuenta final de la confrontacion antiyanqui. 
					
					Los invasores y belicistas deben actuar con prudencia si no quieren recibir el golpe de bombas nucleares y lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados, ya emplazados en todas las zonas operacionales del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de criminal nuclear
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de criminal nuclear
Pyongyang, 16 de marzo (ACNC) -- El comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas de Estados Unidos, Cecil Haney dijo que la modernizacion de las armas nucleares "no admite una opcion como una chispa sobre las cejas".
					Este disparate revela la naturaleza de EE.UU. que amenaza con armas nucleares el mundo y acarrea los desastres nucleares a la humanidad.
					
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					EE.UU. es el pais que malempleo la tecnologia nuclear en la fabricacion de armas de exterminio masivo y causo unicamente las calamidades nucleares a los seres humanos. 
					
					Considerando la bomba atomica como remedio todopoderoso del cumplimiento de su estrategia de hegemonia mundial, la utiliza siglo tras siglo como medio de dominacion, hegemonia, despotismo y opresion. 
					
					El intento de EE.UU. de monopolizar el control nuclear y lograr la estrategia nuclear amenaza gravemente la estabilidad, la paz y el desarrollo del mundo. 
					
					Debido a este imperio americano, se crean una nueva carrera armamentista y el peligro de guerra nuclear en el mundo.
					
					EE.UU. anuncio que auspiciara a finales del mes en curso la cumbre de seguridad nuclear.
					
					Es muy ridiculo el hecho de que este pais, peor criminal nuclear y autor de proliferacion nuclear, hable de la no proliferacion de armas nucleares y sustancias nucleares. 
					
					El imperio del mal debe ser sometido al banquillo de acusados de la historia.
